message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I think your initial offer is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $850000 is a significant amount, but I'm still looking to get a better return on my investment. I'm willing to compromise and offer the product to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you and the value it holds for me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and the value it holds for you.
